rules.description: Glyphs mouse button3 to double click
Glyphs mouse button4 to G
non_us_backslash to SEARCH in ANKI
f1 to Chrome, long-press to Brave
f2 to Finder, long-press to Terminal
f3 to VSCode, long-press to Brackets
f4 to ANKI, long-press to Elmedia
CHROME - non_us_backslash to DevTools
CHROME,BRAVE - refresh
Backtick in Terminal
Shift + non_us_backslash to Tilde in Terminal
Elmedia mouse button3 to spacebar
Anki mouse button3 to previous note
---PC Rules--- Anki mouse button3 to previous note
Anki - HOME to start of line
Anki - END to end of line
non_us_backslash to SEARCH in ANKI
AE - Ctrl + E - search for Effects
C4D - tilda to command search
f1 to Chrome, long-press to Brave
f2 to Finder, long-press to Terminal
f3 to VSCode, long-press to Brackets
f4 to ANKI, long-press to Elmedia
grave-accent-tilde for VSCODE Hold and Non-Hold
F15 to PrintScreen
ESC to ESC, long-press to Glyphs
CHROME - non_us_backslash to DevTools
CHROME,BRAVE - refresh
Shift+ non_us_backslash to Shift+Tilda in Terminal
Tilda to Backtick in Terminal
Elmedia mouse button3 to spacebar
Glyphs mouse button3 to double click
